titles.title: A bill to amend the Military Selective Service Act to improve the ability of the Selective Service System to respond to a mobilization.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to Subcommittee on Military Personnel and Compensation.

bill.summary: 2/2/1987--Introduced. Amends the Military Selective Service Act to include, as part of the Selective Service System still maintained under the all-volunteer forces program, a program for the registration and classification in the System of persons qualified in a health-care occupation essential to the maintenance of the armed forces.
